fingerprint: Survey 102, Assessment 701, 46.66 Sq.Yds, Gift Settlement Deed 2120/2020, Chelluru Village, RCC Slab House, BOUNDARY MISMATCH East/West swapped, 5+ year old deed
ec_summary: EC from Vizianagaram SRO shows Gift Settlement 2120/2020. CRITICAL: Boundary mismatch detected - EC shows East: God House, West: CC Road BUT Deed shows East: CC Road, West: Village Devata House (GOD House). Boundaries are SWAPPED between EC and Deed.
review_notes: L2 accepted with boundary mismatch note. Report correctly identified and disclosed the East/West boundary swap between Deed and EC in Additional Remarks. FI advised to obtain updated EC. This is a common data entry issue in EC portals - the property itself is correctly identified. RCC Slab house construction details (420 sq.m plinth) properly captured.
exceptions: Boundary mismatch between EC and Deed where boundaries are SWAPPED (East↔West or North↔South) is a known EC portal data entry issue - flag it but severity is MINOR if property otherwise matches. Do not flag as CRITICAL unless entire property description differs. 'Village Devata House' = 'God House' = same boundary reference.
flow_summary: Bandukonda Rama Rao (husband, self-acquired RCC Slab house) → Badukonda Maramma (wife) via Gift Settlement 2120/2020. Property includes 46.66 sq.m land + 420 sq.m RCC construction. 5+ year old deed - document age verified.
